thread.title: New Travel website lets you exchange your skills for a free room
thread.title_full: New Travel website lets you exchange your skills for a free room

author: Steven Zussino
title: New Travel website lets you exchange your skills for a free room
text:
New Travel website lets you exchange your skills for a free room New Travel website lets you exchange your skills for a free room August 9, 2015 E-mail 
I found a cool new travel website that lets you save money when you travel! 
Worldpackers is a community based on collaboration and honest relationships that make travel more accessible to those seekin g a profound cultural experience. Through an online platform, we connect travelers – looking to exchange their skills for accommodation – with incredible hosts from all around the world. 
Here are some of the skills you can exchange for a free room: 
Administration
